title: 1.8.9自定义NPCmod为什么会崩溃
author: 神宇零落
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// Shall we play a game?

replies.author: 神宇零落
replies.txt_content:
神宇零落 发表于 2020-4-1 20:07
---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // My bad.  Time: 4/1/20 8:05 PM Description: Initializing game  ja ...
我1.12.2神奇宝贝也进不去了
有可能和其他mod冲突，你试试只放NPCmod会不会崩溃，forge要安装的，你去论坛懒人包板块里下载整合包，然后放入mod
